description: '''Luke Vibert''' (born 26 January 1973) is a British [[electronic music]]ian and [[music producer|producer]], also known for his work under several aliases such as '''Plug''' and '''Wagon Christ'''. Raised in [[Cornwall, England|Cornwall]], Vibert began releasing projects in the 1990s across varied genres, including [[techno]], [[drum and bass]], and [[trip hop]]. He has recorded on labels such as [[Rephlex Records|Rephlex]], [[Ninja Tune]], [[Planet Mu]], and [[Warp Records|Warp]].
